channel.title: Looking for a partner
channel.description: So basically, this will sound strange, but I'm looking for someone who can to all the technical work of the server while I deal with the finance and community side of the server so you wouldn't have to make any financial commitment. I am asking for this because I'm fed up with playing 700+ cache servers which either have no community or a decent set of staff. So yeah, the server will be HD, a bit of a wilderness initiative, but mainly focused on bossing/skilling etc. I would prefer the server to be a long term one, rather than everybody joins, spends £2 for a phat then leaves, because I'm not in it for the money, I just want to create a good community which people can enjoy playing with It's not going to be one of those servers where you can just get 99's like nothing, but it's not going to be piss hard either. I am looking for someone who is committed, enjoys the game and doesn't just copy and paste other peoples code. Feel free to add me on Skype: Nickldinho if you're interested :)

item.title: Looking for a partner
item.dc:creator: @DreadScape DreadScape
item.description:
@DreadScape wrote:

I might, Not in RSPS for the Money just for fun.

Read full topic

item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

So you’re looking for someone to do all the work for you basically? Because managing a server’s finances isn’t a difficult job.

Read full topic
